dcmuiLanguageConfig.title: Language Config
dcmuiLanguageConfig.description: Config the languages of the UI

dcmuiWidgetAets.title: Widget AETs
dcmuiWidgetAets.description: 选择您不想在AET窗体中看到的AET，您可以在其中选择新添加的AET应作为“Accepted Calling AE Title”。

dcmuiBackgroundURL.title: 背景URL
dcmuiBackgroundURL.description: 用于更改UI背景的背景URL。可以是相对URL或绝对URL,图像宽度必须至少为1024px

dcmuiHideOtherPatientIDs.title: Hide Other Patient IDs
dcmuiHideOtherPatientIDs.description: Indicates if other patient identifiers of patient record present in Other Patient IDs Sequence (0010,1002) shall be hidden. By default, all patient identifiers of patient record are displayed separated by comma.

dcmuiLogoURL.title: Logo URL
dcmuiLogoURL.description: 用于更改UI徽标的徽标URL,可以是相对URL或绝对URL,图像宽度必须为140px,png格式,背景必须是透明的。

dcmuiDateTimeFormat.title: Format Date Time
dcmuiDateTimeFormat.description: Here you can format the date time in the UI by using 'yyyy' for the year, 'MM' for the Month, 'dd' for the date, 'HH' for the hour 'mm' for the minutes, 'ss' for the seconds and 'SSS' for milliseconds. To format Date, Time and Date-Time you should use `DATE`, `TIME` and `DATE-TIME` for example like this: `DATE=yyyy-MM-dd, TIME=HH:mm, DATE-TIME=yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm`

dcmuiHideClock.title: Hide Clock
dcmuiHideClock.description: Set to true if you want to hide the clock in the UI

dcmuiPageTitle.title: Page Title
dcmuiPageTitle.description: If set, it will be used as UI page Title ( The Text shown in the Tab of the Browser )

dcmuiPersonNameFormat.title: Format Person Name
dcmuiPersonNameFormat.description: Here you can format the person Name in the UI by using:{FAMILY-NAME}, {GIVEN-NAME}, {MIDDLE-NAME}, {NAME-PREFIX}, {NAME-SUFFIX} for Alphabetic, or by appending 'I_' for the Ideographic and 'P_' for the Phonetic version like {P_FAMILY-NAME}, {I_NAME-SUFFIX}

dcmuiDefaultWidgetAets.title: 默认小部件AETs
dcmuiDefaultWidgetAets.description: 选择小部件AET需要预选的AET。

dcmuiMWLWorklistLabel.title: MWL Worklist Label
dcmuiMWLWorklistLabel.description: Selectable values for MWL Worklist Label

dcmuiInstitutionNameFilterType.title: Institution Name Filter Type
dcmuiInstitutionNameFilterType.description: This will define how the Institution Name filter used in the Navigation Page should be displayed and if there should be a prefilled dropdown and where to get those data from
enum: ui_config|Dropdown by using this config ( See next field 'Institution Names' )|Dropdown by using this config
db|Dropdown will be prefilled with the strings coming by calling the service '../institutions'|Dropdown by querying the Database

dcmuiInstitutionName.title: Institution Names
dcmuiInstitutionName.description: This will be used in combination with the previous field 'Institution Name Filter Type' to prefill the Dropdown of the Filter Institution Names in the Navigation Page
